name: ERC-20
desc: ERC-20 is a technical standard used for smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain for implementing tokens

name: ERC-721
desc: ERC721 tokens, more commonly referred to as Non-Fungible tokens (NFTs)

name: Uniswap
desc: Uniswap is a protocol for automated token exchange on Ethereum.

name: Kyber Network
desc: Kyber is an on-chain liquidity protocol that aggregates liquidity from a wide range of reserves, powering instant and secure token exchange in any decentralized application.
